title: Good 4 u/Fuck Back
lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah)
Pre-Chorus
Going back, hey there before
Before there was a difference
[Chorus]
Well, good for you
You look happy and healthy, not me
If you ever cared to ask
Good for you
You're doin' great out there without me, baby
God, I wish that I could do that
I've lost my mind, I've spent the night
Cryin' on the floor of my bathroom
But you're so unaffected, I really don't get it
But I guess good for you
Verse 2
But you didn't wanna change a thing
But now were back, where we meant to be
But you didn't change a thing!
The spotlight on you
[Chorus]
Well, good for you
You look happy and healthy, not me
If you ever cared to ask
Good for you
You're doin' great out there without me, baby
God, I wish that I could do that
I've lost my mind, I've spent the night
Cryin' on the floor of my bathroom
But you're so unaffected, I really don't get it
But I guess good for you

[Break]
(Ah-ah-ah-ah)
(Ah-ah-ah-ah)
[Bridge]
Maybe I'm too emotional
But your apathy's like a wound in salt
Maybe I'm too emotional
Or maybe you never cared at all
Maybe I'm too emotional
Your apathy is like a wound in salt
Maybe I'm too emotional
Or maybe you never cared at all
[Chorus]
Well, good for you
You look happy and healthy, not me
If you ever cared to ask
Good for you
You're doin' great out there without me, baby
Like a damn sociopath
I've lost my mind, I've spent the night
Cryin' on the floor of my bathroom
But you're so unaffected, I really don't get it
But I guess good for you

[Outro]
Well, good for you, I guess you moved on really easily
Chorus
F**k your love
F**k you yea
F**k you f**k
F**k you yea
Verse 2
Theres nothing they want in life
Theres nothing they would die for
Theres nothing they would sacrifice
For anything or anyone giving a f**k
Pre-Chorus
Im trying to get up
A nice healthy f**k
Chorus
F**k your love
F**k you yea
F**k you f**k
F**k you yea
Bridge
She know I be waiting, way she be acting so extra
She be sticking around giving almighty helping hand

Chorus
F**k your love
F**k you yea
F**k you f**k
F**k you yea
